text:
@RahulGandhi Yes, Modi is trying his best. 

His best not to test, test, test.

His best not to have reliable rapid testing kits.

His best not to supply PPE. 

His best not to give accurate figures and data. 

His best not to have a Covid-19 testing regime in place.
